description.summary: Using a random dataset to create a simple barchart.
notes: To be able to center an svg inside a div, you need to change it's display to block (inline by default). At that point, you can apply margin: auto.
To be able to see a rect svg, you need to set the x, y, width, height attributes on them.
Implementing behaviour for click, mouseenter, mouseout
Silky smooth hover animation made possible by transition().duration(500)
